# UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction

**Structure**

A structure that describes types of interactions.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction
```

## Overview

Specify which interactions you want the activity view to include in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityItemsConfiguration/supportedInteractions].

## Selecting interactions

- **copy**: The copy interaction.
- **share**: The share interaction.

## Creating an interaction type

- **init(_:)**: Creates an activity items configuration interaction.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an activity items configuration interaction with the specified raw value.

## Managing supported interactions

- **supportedInteractions**: The types of interactions that the configuration supports.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
